headline: Flooding around the UK - in pictures
text: A horse and cart passes flooded fields and roads in North Curry, Somerset Photograph: Matt Cardy/Getty Images       A car is stranded in floodwater in Norton, Worcester Photograph: David Davies/PA       The sun reflects on floodwater in North Curry Photograph: Matt Cardy/Getty Images       Floodwater on the roads near Halesowen, West Midlands Photograph: David Jones/PA       Floodwater surrounds a cottage, North Curry Photograph: Matt Cardy/Getty Images       A 4x4 passes abandoned cars, North Curry Photograph: Matt Cardy/Getty Images       Firefighters remove a car from floodwater near Tetbury, Gloucestershire Photograph: Tim Ireland/PA       A train waits to pass along a flooded track, between North Curry and Taunton Photograph: Matt Cardy/Getty Images       Cars negotiate floodwater, Tetbury Photograph: Tim Ireland/PA       Barrow village, Somerset Photograph: Robert Timoney/Rex Features       A rider passes flooded fields, North Curry Photograph: Matt Cardy/Getty Images       A car stuck in floodwater in Chilcompton, Somerset Photograph: Matt Cardy/Getty Images
